answers.answer: Your symptoms mimic Peripheral Neuropathy as a result of letting your diabetes go uncontrolled. PN is damage to your nervous system resulting in loss of muscle use, loss of reflexes, poor coordination, and could spread to bone as an infection. If you ignore medical treatment it may result in amputation and a wheelchair. Please see your doctor, like yesterday. Good luck
